column1: @entity1 and @entity0 waited in their mom's truck. They all were going to the circus to see the clowns. Their Mom had to take their little brother back into the house to get more diapers and go to the bathroom. @entity1 was worried because he did not want to miss the wolf clown. @entity0 watched her brother rub his chin. "Why are you looking out the window?" she asked.  "Mom needs to hurry.  We might miss the clowns."  "I am going to get out of the truck and draw triangles in the sand." @entity0 said. "No! You might make us miss it." @entity1 cried.  Before she could get out of the truck @entity0 saw her mom and little brother walk out of the house. Her mom got in the truck and asked, "Okay kids are we ready to go?" @entity1 and @entity0 yelled, "Yes!" When they got to the circus @entity1 and @entity0 saw all the clowns. Their little brother was too young to go into the tent, so their mom stayed with him. The show ended and they walked to the truck.  "What do you have there?" @entity1 asked @entity0 "It is a bag I found in the tent." @entity0 said.  "We have to return that @entity0." Their mom said.  "Why? It has cool stuff in it. I found it." @entity0 said.  "It is not ours." Their mom said.  @entity0 frowned as they walked to the lost and found and gave the bag back. Then they all went home. When they were washing up to go to bed @entity0 said, "I fear some of those clowns. The wolf one was scary."  "@entity0, I can save you. The wolf clown was a person in make-up."  With that they shut off the bathroom light and went to bed. A great day had by all.
@placeholder did @entity1 say to @entity0 to calm her fear
he said he would save her and that the wolf clown was a person in make-up
he said the circus had all clowns
he said their little brother was too young
he said he would save her and that the wolf clown was a person in make-up
he said their mom went to the bathroom
